allow:

Initial commit - Current working version

This is the baseline before implementing evaluation improvements.

- Complete GitHub Pages site with 3 category pages + deal tracker
- All FRED and market data fetchers working
- VC/M&A custom charts integrated
- User''s original metric descriptions
- Teal theme (#226E93)
- Mobile-responsive design
- 17 HTML pages, 2,300+ lines of code

All data loading correctly. Site ready for enhancements.
EOF
)")
